effects.scanline: background: repeating-linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.15), rgba(0,0,0,0.15) 1px, transparent 1px, transparent 2px)

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-400 text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-cyan-300 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(0,229,255,0.3)] transition-all
buttons.secondary: border border-white/20 text-white uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-white/5 hover:border-white/50 transition-all
buttons.icon: p-2 rounded-md hover:bg-white/10 text-zinc-400 hover:text-white transition-all

cards.default: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/10 rounded-lg p-4 hover:border-cyan-500/30 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-[#121212] border border-white/10 rounded-md px-3 py-2 text-sm focus:border-cyan-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500 outline-none transition-all placeholder:text-zinc-600

badges.base: px-2 py-0.5 text-[10px] font-mono uppercase tracking-wide border rounded-sm

dashboard_grid.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 p-4 h-[calc(100vh-64px)] overflow-hidden

areas.scanner: col-span-12 md:col-span-3 lg:col-span-2 h-full overflow-y-auto border-r border-white/10 pr-2
areas.main_feed: col-span-12 md:col-span-6 lg:col-span-7 h-full overflow-y-auto px-2
areas.context_panel: col-span-12 md:col-span-3 lg:col-span-3 h-full overflow-y-auto border-l border-white/10 pl-2

modal.overlay: fixed inset-0 bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-sm z-50 flex items-center justify-center p-4
modal.content: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/10 w-full max-w-5xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto rounded-lg shadow-2xl relative animate-in fade-in zoom-in-95 duration-200

card_structure.header: Flex row: Ticker (Mono, Bold, Lg) + Price + %Change (Color coded)
card_structure.body: Grid: Strategy Name (Badge) | Catalyst Score (Progress Bar) | RVOL (Text)
card_structure.footer: Flex row: 'Trade' Button (Primary, Sm) + 'Analyze' Button (Ghost, Sm)

sections: Header: Ticker, Company Name, Sector, Price, Change
Stats Grid: Market Cap, Vol, Float, Short Interest, Earnings Date
Strategies: List of active strategies for this ticker
News: Compact list with sentiment indicators

assets.logos: Use text placeholders or generic finance icons if specific logos unavailable

universal_guidelines: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL numerical data and tickers.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (brightness-110 or border color change).
Use skeleton loaders for real-time data fetching states.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors with subtle borders.
Scrollbars must be thin and styled (zinc-800 track, zinc-600 thumb).
All dates must be formatted as 'DD MMM HH:mm' in Mono font.
Strategy names must be cleaned: 'INT-Breakout' -> 'Breakout' (remove technical prefixes in UI if possible, or style them distinctively).
